Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Campbell
ShortDescription: #20 Madison buses are via Madison Western, Jackson, California, then resume their normal route on Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison Western, Jackson, California, then resume their normal route on Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.
